sn51.12:1.1: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṁsā.
sn51.12:1.2: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, cattāro iddhipādā kathaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṁsā?
sn51.12:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti—
sn51.12:1.4: iti me chando na ca atilīno bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṁ saṅkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.12:1.6: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.12:1.7: yathā adho tathā uddhaṁ, yathā uddhaṁ tathā adho;
sn51.12:1.8: yathā divā tathā rattiṁ, yathā rattiṁ tathā divā.
sn51.12:1.9: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṁ cittaṁ bhāveti.
sn51.12:2.4: iti me vīmaṁsā na ca atilīnā bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitā bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṁ saṅkhittā bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati.
sn51.12:2.6: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.12:2.7: yathā adho tathā uddhaṁ, yathā uddhaṁ tathā adho;
sn51.12:2.8: yathā divā tathā rattiṁ, yathā rattiṁ tathā divā.
sn51.12:2.9: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṁ cittaṁ bhāveti.
sn51.12:2.10: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, cattāro iddhipādā evaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṁsā.
sn51.12:3.1: Evaṁ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catūsu iddhipādesu evaṁ bahulīkatesu anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti …pe… yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteti …pe….
sn51.12:4.1: Evaṁ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catūsu iddhipādesu evaṁ bahulīkatesu, āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
